verbose_text: Cell-type-specific deletion of Tfam in T cells by the CD4-Cre transgene causes severe mitochondrial respiration defects, lysosomal storage disorders, and enhanced proinflammatory interferon gamma (IFN-gamma) production by CD4 + T cells but has no obvious effect on Treg maintenance in the thymus and spleen.
evidence: Tfam in T cells by the CD4-Cre transgene causes severe mitochondrial respiration defects, lysosomal storage disorders, and enhanced proinflammatory interferon gamma
